Key Match Events: Redick drew up a play to get Reaves a three-point shot which he missed
Phoenix intentionally fouled LeBron James with 6.4 seconds left to secure the win
Post-Match Reflections: Redick took responsibility for the Lakers' 14-point second quarter
James expressed that losses are inevitable but how the team plays defines their character
Redick's passion is evident in his coaching style
Miscellaneous Highlights: Davis dominated early with 29 points, 15 rebounds and three blocks
The Lakers led 26-8 less than seven minutes into the game
Durant and Booker helped the Suns quickly push back into the game
